name: Greddy Ghost
description:
● Description:

The Greddy Ghost needs to eat  MONEY for satisfy your will! Go and eat all 20 coins scattered in cemetery, but be careful with other ghosts!

● Informations:

- Project Started: 08/02/2022

- Project Finished: 23/03/2022

- Engine: Unity 2020.3.25f1

- Programming: C# on Visual Studio 2019

- Art: Aseprite

- Sound: --- Free Copyright Sounds ---

● Controls:

WASD or Arrow's = Move

DPAD Horizontal and Vertical = Move

Esc or Start = Pause

Enter or A = Submit
